title: London Real and How Societies Collapse
description:
In April, Rebel Wisdom ran a series of investigations into London Real's suspicious 'Digital Freedom Platform' fundraiser.

Now the head of London Real, Brian Rose, has announced that he's running for Mayor of London. Meanwhile he's been deleting a load of his old videos and much more.

What does the story of Brian Rose say about our society? What does it have in common with cult dynamics? And what is the 'sociopathic niche'?

Original Investigation: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hDM1wTGOjOw&t=931s

This film has clips from:

The Paradox of the Times, Jordan Hall: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_SmGMJzWHK4

How to spot a cult, Jamie Wheal: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t9_FcnECNS8&t=812s

Converting Moloch from Sith to Jedi w/ Daniel Schmachtenberger (The Stoa): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hKvVdGNzCQk

Brian Rose is Running for Mayor - I PREDICTED THIS!? (Coffeezilla): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F9iwY_A84f4&t=97s

The King of Free Speech CENSORED Me! (Coffeezilla): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JAX1eSLNT4w

----

Rebel Wisdom has just relaunched our community, become a member here: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans
